K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:382b-11: tshad ma mchis pa dag mthong la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:383a-0: ting nge 'dzin de bar ma dor chab 'tshal bar ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par @383a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:383a-3: gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe sems can dag gis bdag gi ming thos la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:383a-4: thos ma thag pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can rnams byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du rigs bzang po'i rigs su skye ba thob par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:383a-6: gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe 'di las gzhan du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis bdag gi ming thos par gyur la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:383a-7: de thos ma thag pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:383a-8: mchog tu dga' ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang phrad par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:383a-10: gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe 'di las gzhan du gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis bdag gi ming thos ma thag tu kun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par ma gyur pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:383b-0: byang chub sems dpa' dag ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas skad cig gcig @383b 'das pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs ma mchis /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:383b-4: tshad ma mchis pa dag la bsti stang bgyid la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:383b-5: ting nge 'dzin de byang chub kyi snying po'i mtha'i bar du bar ma dor cha ba 'tshal bar ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:383b-7: gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag chos bstan pa rnam pa ji lta bu nyan 'tshal bar gyur pa chos bstan pa rnam pa de lta bu sems bskyed ma thag tu thos par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:383b-9: gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis bdag gi ming thos pa de dag bdag gi ming thos ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:383b-11: gal te bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis bdag gi ming thos par gyur pa de dag gi ming thos ma thag tu bzod pa dang po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-1: gsum pa thob par ma gyur pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-2: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-4: de nas dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas des smon lam gyi khyad par rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag bstan nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-5: gal te dag gis byang chub thob tshe smon lam mchog /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-6: khyad par 'phags pa rnam pa 'di 'drar ma gyur na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-7: stobs bcu mnga' ba mtshungs pa ma mchis sbyin pa'i gnas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-8: mi yi seng ge sems can snying por bdag ma gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-9: gal te bdag zhing rnam pa de 'drar ma gyur la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-10: sems can dbul mang nor mang stsal par ma gyur cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-11: sdug bsngal gyur pa'i mi dag bde bar ma bgyis par //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-12: mi yi rgyal po dkon mchog tu ni bdag ma gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-13: bdag ni byang chub snying por nye bar mchis pa'i tshe //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-14: phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams mang po tha gru che //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-15: mtha' yas dag tu myur du ming grags ma gyur par //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-16: 'jig rten mgon po stobs brnyes par ni bdag ma gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-17: byang chub mtshungs med zhi ba yang dag tshol ba na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384a-18: dran dang blo gros rtogs pa rnam par nyams gyur cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-0: gal te bdag ni 'dod pa'i longs spyod spyod gyur @384b na; ;'jig rten ston pa stobs brnyes par ni bdag ma gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-1: shin tu rgyas 'od mtshungs pa ma mchis mtha' yas pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-2: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams mgon po'i sangs rgyas zhing kun khyab; ;'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug thams cad rab zhi zhing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-3: sems can dmyal bar dong ba'i me rnams zhi bar bgyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-4: shin tu mdzes shing yangs pa'i mig ni phyi nas su //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-5: mi rnams kun gyi mun nag rnam par bsal bar bgyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-6: dal ba med pa dag ni ma lus bsal nas su //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-7: gzi brjid mtha' yas mtho ris lam du gzung bar bgyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-8: sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su dag par spyad nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-9: mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od ni lam me ma lags shing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-10: nor bu'i tshogs dang me dang lha yi 'od rnams kyang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-11: mi yi seng ge'i 'od kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-12: skyes bu mchog gyur sdug bsngal rnams kyi gter gyur te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-13: phyogs mtshams phyogs na de 'dra'i gzugs ni ma mchis shing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-14: dge ba brgya stong dag ni rab tu rdzogs gyur nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-15: 'khor na'ang mchis te sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-16: sngon gyi rgyal ba rang byung dag la gus bgyis te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-17: brtul zhugs dka' thub bye ba dpag med spyad nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-18: ye shes phung po dam pa mchog rab btsal nas su //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-19: smon lam stobs ni rdzogs bgyis sems can snying por 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:384b-20: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das ye shes gzigs pa chags mi mnga'//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-0: mi yi dbang po 'dus byas rnam gsum rab @385a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-2: bdag kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis sbyin gnas mkhas pa dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-3: mi rnams nang na mi yi 'dren pa mchog gyur cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-4: mi dbang bdag gis byang chub rab tu thob nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-5: gal te smon lam 'di 'dra 'di dag 'grub ce na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-6: stong gi 'jig rten khams 'di rab tu g-yos gyur cing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-7: lha yi tshogs kyis mkha' las me tog char phob cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-8: sa yang rab tu g-yos te me tog char yang bab //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-9: nam mkha' las kyang sil snyan rnams kyi sgra yang byung //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-10: lha yi tsan dan mdzes pa dag gi phye ma yang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-11: mngon par 'thob bar gyur te 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-14: dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-16: smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni nyung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-17: smon lam rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 'jig rten du byung ba nyung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-19: ye med pa ni ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-21: dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po de'i spyan sngar lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385a-23: dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385b-0: lha dang mi dang lha ma @385b yin du bcas pa'i mdun du smon lam gyi khyad par rnam pa de lta bu de dag bstan nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sgrub pa la gnas par gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385b-1: de sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang; sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi che ba nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha gru chen po rnam pa de lta bu de dag ni sgrub /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa ni spyod cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385b-4: lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385b-10: brjod du med par lan 'ga' yang 'dod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385b-12: rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385b-15: rnam par 'tshe ba'i 'du shes bskyed par ma gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385b-20: reg bya'i 'du shes bskyed par ma gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385b-21: gzhon nu des shing 'grogs na bde ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385b-22: dang du len pa'i rang bzhin can dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:385b-38: dkar po'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa mi 'dor bar gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386a-0: sems can thams cad kyi don du @386a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386a-1: smon lam chen po yang dag par bsgrubs par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386a-7: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus pa dang bcas shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rtag tu go cha bgos te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386a-12: yon tan dang ldan zhing sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i sngon du ni 'gro /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386a-16: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386a-18: 'gag pa med pa'i gnas pas ni gnas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386a-19: nga rgyal med cing ngag legs par bsrungs par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na des ngag gi las 'byung ba gang bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka la gnod par 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu spangs nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386a-21: ngag gi las gang bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka la phan par 'gyur ba de la brtson par gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386a-22: de ltar shes bzhin can du gyur cing grong dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386a-26: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'jug pa na nam yang gzugs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386a-31: chos la rjes su chags pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386a-32: khong khro ba med par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386b-0: de byang chub sems dpa'i @386b spyad pa spyod pa na bdag nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386b-1: gzhan yang de nyid yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386b-2: bdag nyid kyang tshul khrims dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386b-6: gzhan yang de nyid yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386b-7: gang dag dang ldan na gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas las 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bsgrubs par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386b-8: de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang dag ngag gi las kyis mthar phyin par sla ba ma yin pa de snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa de snyed la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386b-15: bde bar sbyar ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386b-19: sems can ji snyed rab tu smin par byas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:386b-24: bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu dag la rab tu bkod pa de dag kyang tshig gis bstan pas mthar phyin par sla ba ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387a-0: de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbang @387a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387a-6: yongs su dga' ldan nyid dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387a-10: tshangs pa chen po nyid la rab tu bkod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa de snyed la bsti stang du byas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387a-14: mchod nas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bya ba'i phyir gsol ba btab pa de dag kyang ngag gi las kyis bstan pa mthar phyin par sla ba ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387a-15: de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387a-16: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387a-21: brjod du med par kha nas lha'i las shin tu 'das pa'i tsan dan dri rab tu zhim pa'i bsung 'byung ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387a-22: spu'i khung bu thams cad nas me tog autpa la'i bsung 'byung ba dang; 'jig rten thams cad na gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387a-23: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387a-24: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387a-25: de'i rin po che'i rgyan thams cad dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387a-26: gos dang chos gos mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-2: ba dan mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-3: rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang glu dbyangs mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad kyang spu'i khung bu thams cad dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-4: lag pa gnyis nas 'byung ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-10: ro bro ba mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad dang longs spyod dang yongs su spyad pa mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad kyang lag pa gnyis nas zag cing 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnam pa de lta bu'i dge ba yang dag par bsgrubs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-12: de ltar dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-13: yo byad thams cad la dbang ba'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-14: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-15: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi 'byung gnas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-19: yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags sam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-20: 'on te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma rgyas sam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-21: 'on te de ltar byung ba na mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-22: da lta na bzhugs la 'tsho zhing gzhes te chos kyang ston /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:387b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:388a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas da ltar na bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:388a-3: 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ces bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:388a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:388a-5: nyan thos mtha' yas pa dag gis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:388a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa dang ldan no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:388a-7: de'i 'od ni dpag tu med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:388a-8: de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di snyed cig dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:388a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag 'di snyed cig dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:388a-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag 'di snyed cig dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:388a-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:388a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'di snyed cig dang /

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:393b-19: mtha' na rin po che sna bdun gyi chu shing gi sdong po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:393b-20: rin po che'i shing ta la'i phreng gis yongs su bskor to //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:393b-24: dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam yang yod /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:393b-30: dpag tshad bcu'i bar gyi tshad tsam dag kyang yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:393b-31: rin po che'i padma thams cad las kyang 'od zer bye ba stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug 'byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394a-1: thams cad las kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku gser gyi kha dog can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba bye ba stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug 'byung ste; de dag shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu gshegs nas sems can rnams la chos ston to //

K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394a-9: ri thams cad kyang rin po che'i ri sha stag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394a-10: ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394a-12: ri'i rgyal po khor yug chen po thams cad dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394a-13: mtsho chen po rnams med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394a-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni kun du mnyam pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394a-17: sa phyogs rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394a-18: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394a-19: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394a-21: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha ri rab kyi ngos la gnas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394a-22: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas pa de dag gang na gnas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-1: 'di na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi gong ma 'thab bral gyi lha rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-7: tshangs chen nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams gang na gnas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-10: las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-11: las mngon par 'du bgyid pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-14: las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-15: las mngon par 'du byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni rnyed par rung gi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-18: byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sus kyang mtha' ma /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-21: gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes rab tu 'byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-22: de ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-23: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-25: 'byor pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-28: bdag ni de la dogs pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-31: bdag ni ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi dogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-33: the tshom bsal ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhu'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:394b-34: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-2: de lta bu ni khyod kyi bya ba yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na chu klung rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'bab ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-5: de na chu klung chen po kha tshon dpag tshad tsam dag kyang yod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-11: kha tshon dpag tshad brgya stong gi tshad tsam dag kyang yod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-12: zabs su ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa dag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-13: chu klung de dag thams cad kyang spos dri rab tu zhim pa sna tshogs kyi chur 'bab cing rin po che'i me tog sil ma'i tshogs dag 'bab pa dag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-14: sgra dbyangs snyan pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang yang ldan pa dag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-16: chu klung chen po de dag las lha'i glu dbyangs yan lag bye ba brgya stong dang ldan pa'i sil snyan dag mkhas pa rnams kyis byas pa bas lhag pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-17: chu klung chen po de dag las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byung ba ni zab pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-18: kun du shes par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-19: rnam par shes par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-20: brdzun pa ma yin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-26: mnyan pas chog mi shes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-27: mnyan pa dang mthun pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395a-30: bdag med ces bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-0: de dag sems can de dag gi rna ba'i @395b dbang po la grag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-2: chu klung chen po de dag gi 'gram gnyis ni rin po che'i spos kyi shing ljon pa dag gis gang ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-3: de dag la yal ga dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-7: de na sems can gang dag chu klung gi 'gram de dag tu zang zing med pa'i lha'i dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-8: rtse ba myong bar 'dod pa de dag chu klung de dag tu 'jug pa'i tshe /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-9: 'dod na chu long bu nub tsam du gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-10: 'dod na chu pus mo nub tsam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-11: 'dod na rked pa nub tsam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-12: 'dod na mchan khung nub tsam dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-13: 'dod na mid pa nub tsam du chu gnas par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-14: lha'i dga' ba dag kyang 'byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-15: der sems can gang dag chu grang bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod na yang de dag la bsil bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-16: gang dag dro bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod na yang de dag la dro bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-18: dro bar gyur cig snyam du 'dod na yang de dag la chu de bsil ba dang dro bar 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-20: chu klung chen po de dag ni lha'i shing ta ma la'i lo ma dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-22: dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-24: tsan dan sprul gyi snying po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-25: spos mchog gis bsgos pa'i chus yongs su gang ste 'bab pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-26: lha'i me tog autpa la dang; padma dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-29: dri rab tu zhim pa dag gi me tog gis khebs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:395b-30: khol khol dag na bya ngang pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396a-7: rma bya la sogs pa sgra yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396a-8: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i bya'i tshogs kyis bsten pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396a-10: ngang pa'i rgyal po rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396a-13: gser gyi bye ma bdal ba dag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396a-14: de na gang gi tshe sems can de dag bdag cag gi bsam pa 'di 'dra ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig snyam du 'dod pa de'i tshe de dag gi bsam pa de lta bu dag chos dang ldan par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396a-16: chu de las yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba gang yin pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la go bar byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396a-17: de na sems can gang dag chu ngogs na 'khod pa dag sgra 'di bdag cag gi rna ba'i dbang po la grags par ma gyur cig ces 'dod na de de dag gi lha'i rna ba'i dbang po la grags par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396a-18: gang sgra rnam pa ji lta bu thos par 'dod pa de rnam pa de lta bu'i sgra yid du 'ong ba thos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396a-23: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396a-27: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i sgra dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396a-28: mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-0: @396b so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgra dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-4: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-11: nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-15: btang snyoms chen po'i sgra dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-16: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-17: dbang bskur ba'i sa rab tu thob pa'i sgra dag thos so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-18: des sgra rnam pa de lta bu thos nas dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-19: mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-20: dben pa dang ldan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-21: 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-22: zhi ba dang ldan pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-25: byang chub yongs su 'grub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-27: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na mi dge ba'i ming med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-28: sgrib pa'i sgra yang yong med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-29: ngan song ngan 'gro rnam par ltung ba'i sgra yang yong med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-30: sdug bsngal gyi sgra yang yong med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-32: de na sdug bsngal yang ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-33: bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba'i sgra yang med na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-35: sdug bsngal gyi sgra lta ga la yod /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-37: mdor bsdu na rnam grangs 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba can zhes bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:396b-38: rgyas par ni ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397a-1: na; bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par zad zad du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bde ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod kyang bde ba'i rgyu de dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397a-3: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der sems can gang dag skyes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397a-5: skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang gzugs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397a-12: mngon par shes pa dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397a-17: khang pa brtsegs pa yongs su spyad pa rnam pa de lta bu dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397a-22: reg bya yongs su spyad pa rnam pa de lta bu dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397a-24: yongs su spyad pa rnam pa de lta bu thams cad dang ldan te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397a-26: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang 'dra'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397a-28: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi sems can dag kham gyi zas za ba rags pa'i kha zas mi za'i /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397a-29: kha zas rnam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa rnam pa de lta bu 'byor pa nyid du shes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397a-32: zhes de dag yang lus la 'jug par mi byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397b-0: de dag lus tshim nas spos kyi rnam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu'i lha'i spos kyi rnam pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi @397b zhing thams cad bdugs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397b-1: de na gang dri de la snom par mi 'dod pa de la spos dri'i 'du shes dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397b-2: bsgos pa tsam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397b-3: de ltar gang dag spos dang; phreng ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397b-9: sil snyan rnam pa ji lta bu dag 'dod pa de dag gi rnam pa de lta bu de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad yongs su khyab par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397b-10: de dag gos kha dog tha dad pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397b-11: kha dog brgya stong du ma ci 'dra ba 'dod pa de lta bu'i gos rin po che dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad yongs su khyab par 'gyur zhing lus la bgos par bdag nyid kyis shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397b-16: lag pa dang; rkang pa'i rgyan 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397b-28: mu tig gi dra ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397b-29: rin po che thams cad kyi dril bu g-yer kha'i dra ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397b-30: rgyan ji lta bu 'dod pa rnam pa de lta bu'i rgyan rin po che brgya stong du mas spras pa 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397b-31: rin po che'i shing ljon pa la 'phyang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gang bar mthong ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:397b-32: rgyan de dag gis bdag brgyan par yang shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398a-5: rin po che sna tshogs kyi ba gam brgya stong gis brgyan pa rin po che'i khri lha'i ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398a-6: sngas khra bo bzhag pa dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu'i gzhal med khang de dag de dag gi mdun du 'byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398a-7: de dag rin po che'i gzhal med khang grub pa de dag gi nang na lha'i bu mo bdun stong bdun stong gis yongs su bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas nas 'khod de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398a-8: rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398a-9: 'jig rten gyi khams de na lha dang mi rnams tha dad pa med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398a-10: gzhan du na kun rdzob kyi tha snyad kyis lha dang mi zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba ni ma gtogs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398a-14: 'khor lo'i bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i mdun na mi ma rabs dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398a-15: mi za ma ni lam me ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398a-17: lhang nge ma yin zhing mi 'jigs pa ma yin la 'od gsal ba ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398a-18: de bzhin du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi mdun na lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398a-26: dbang phyug gis lam me ma yin /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398a-29: chos mngon par rtogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398a-30: chos la yongs su spyod pa ni ma gtogs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398b-1: de la gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams blta bar bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na snga dro'i dus nye bar gnas pa'i tshe phyogs bzhi kun nas 'khrugs shing kun du 'khrugs pa'i rlung ldang ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398b-4: de dag gis rin po che'i shing ljon pa bkra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398b-7: kha dog du ma yod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398b-8: lha'i spos dri rab tu zhim pa sna tshogs kyis bsgo sa pa de dag bskyod /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398b-11: kun du bsgul nas de dag la sa me tog rnam pa mang po yid du 'ong ba'i bsung can blta na sdug pa dag rin po che'i sa chen po de la 'brul te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398b-12: me tog de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun du mi 'greng ba bdun srid du bkram par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398b-14: skyes bu sa la me tog 'grems mkhas pa zhig gis lag pa gnyis kas bkram ste mnyam par bkod na shin tu bkra zhing blta na sdug go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398b-15: de bzhin du me tog bsung dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398b-16: kha dog tha dad pa dang ldan pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun du mi 'greng bdun tsam du khyab par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398b-17: me tog gi rnam pa de dag ni 'jam pa ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398b-18: dpe tsam du na gos ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde ba'o; ;de dag ni rkang pa 'jog pa na sor bzhi tsam gyis dma' bar 'gyur zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:398b-19: rkang pa 'degs pa na sor bzhi tsam gyis mtho bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-0: snga dro'i dus 'das nas me tog de dag kyang ma @399a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-2: de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-4: dag par 'gyur zhing me tog snga ma rnams kyis rnyogs pa med par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-5: de nas yang phyogs bzhi kun nas rlung langs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-6: gang sngon ma byung ba'i me tog sar pa dag mngon par 'thor ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-7: snga dro ji lta bar nyi ma'i gung dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-8: phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-11: tho rangs kyang de bzhin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-13: dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i rlung de dag langs nas sems can de dag la reg na 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-15: dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pas bsnyad pa ma gtogs par me dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-23: mun pa mun nag gi ming du gdags pa yong med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-24: nyin mo dang mtshan mor gdags pa yang yong med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-25: khyim yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes kyang yong med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-27: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na dus dus su lha'i spos chu'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-28: lha'i me tog kha dog thams cad dang ldan pa dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-29: lha'i rin po che sna bdun dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399a-30: lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-0: ba @399b dan gyi char mngon par 'bab bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-1: lha'i bla re dag kyang 'dzin to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-2: lha'i rin po che'i gdugs rnga ma'i bsil yab dang bcas pa dag kyang nam mkha' la 'dzin to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-3: lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag kyang sgrogs shing lha'i bu mo dag kyang gar byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-7: skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du yang dag pa nyid du nges par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-11: log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po gnyis rnam par bzhag pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-12: gdags pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-14: mdor bsdu na rnam grangs 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba can zhes bya ste rgyas par ni ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-16: rgyas par bstan na ni bskal pa zad zad du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi bde ba'i rgyu rnams yongs su brjod kyang bde ba'i rgyu de dag gi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-17: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-18: sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs gyur la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-19: dam pa'i don mkhas ye shes rnam dag ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-20: de dag bskal pa'am 'on te lhag par ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-21: bde ba can gyi bsngags pa rab brjod kyang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-22: bsngags pa'i phreng ba rab tu brjod pa na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-23: bskal pa bye ba de dag zad 'gyur gyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:399b-24: bde ba can gyi bsngags pa mthar mi phyin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-2: gang gis phra rab rdul snyed 'jig rten khams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-3: bshig cing btags te rdul du byas gyur pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-4: de bas mang ba'i 'jig rten khams kyi rnams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-5: rin chen bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-6: gang gis dpag tu med pa'i 'od mtshan dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-7: bde ba can gyi yon tan khyad 'phags rnams //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-8: thos nas dga' ste thal mo sbyor byed pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-9: bsod nams 'di yi char yang 'gyur ma yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-10: de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-11: yon tan thos nas mgu dang dad skyes la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-12: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams mchog tu; ;'gro bar bya phyir mos pa drag po bskyed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-13: gang gis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-14: ming thos pa yi bsod nams de la ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-15: zhing mchog tha gru chen po de dag kun //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-16: cha dang dper yang 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-17: gang dag rgyal ba'i bka' dang shes rab can //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-18: de dag de bas bsod nams mang du 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-19: don dam thob phyir dad pa rtsa ba ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-20: de lta bas na thos nas yid gnyis sol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400a-22: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi yon tan dang bsngags pa de ltar dpag tu med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400b-0: phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan yongs su brjod @400b do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400b-2: grags pa rab tu sgrogs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400b-5: sems can gang dag kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de'i mtshan thos la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400b-6: thos nas kyang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam zhig bsam pa thag pa nas dad pa dang dga' ba bskyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400b-8: sems can gang dag kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa de rnam pas yang dang yang yid la byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400b-9: dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa bskyed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400b-10: byang chub tu sems yongs su bsngos te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de dge slong gi tshogs du mas yongs su bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas nas bzhugs par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400b-12: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med de mthong nas rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis shi 'phos te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:400b-15: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dag gis tshe 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mthong yang ci ma rung snyam du sems ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401a-0: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rgyud kyis sangs @401a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401a-1: rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir sems yang dag par btang ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401a-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya zhing yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401a-4: gang dag yang de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yid la byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dpag tu med pa rgyun du bskyed la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems yang dag par gtod pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus nye bar gnas pa na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'i kha dog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401a-9: zham 'bring ba dge slong gi dge 'dun ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dag mdun du gnas par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401a-10: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas rab tu dang ba la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401a-11: brjed pa med pa'i dran pas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401a-13: sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam rjes su dran par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'dod la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401a-14: chos zab mo dag 'chad pa na dga' ba 'thob cing sgyid lug pa med la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401a-15: mi 'gong mi zhum zhing tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de yi da la byed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-0: 'dod pa yang bskyed na de dag rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de @401b mthong zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-1: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag don gyi dbang de gzigs nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i mtshan kyang yongs su brjod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-7: phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-10: yongs su dri ba bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i khyad par de dag blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'dong ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-13: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgyas par gsung zhing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-14: tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-15: 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-16: phyag bya'i phyir ni shar gyi sangs rgyas zhing //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-17: mtha' yas gangg'a'i klung gi bye snyed nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-18: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lhags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-19: de dag me tog kha dog tha dad pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-20: dri zhim yid 'ong mang po snyim thogs te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-21: tshe dpag med pa lha dang mis mchod pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:401b-22: mi yi 'dren pa mchog la rab tu 'thor //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-0: @402a *// 'dren pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-1: phyag bya'i phyir ni de bzhin lho nub dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-2: byang phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams ji snyed nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-3: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag lhags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-4: de dag spos kyi kha dog tha dad pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-5: dri zhim yid 'ong mang po snyim thogs te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-6: tshe dpag med pa lha dang mis mchod pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-7: mi yi 'dren pa mchog la rab tu 'thor //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-8: byang chub sems dpa' mang po de dag gis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-9: mchod pa byas te dpag med 'od zhabs la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-10: phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas 'di skad du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-11: sangs rgyas zhing ni ngo mtshar mdzes zhes 'dzer //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-12: dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems ni gzhal yas kyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-13: de dag gis ni me tog snyim gtor nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-14: 'dren pa de yi spyan sngar 'di skad du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-15: bdag cag zhing yang 'di 'drar gyur ces smras //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-16: de dag me tog snyim pa gtor ma thag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-17: de tshe dpag tshad brgya pa'i gdugs gyur te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-18: legs par brgyan zhing yu ba bkra bas mdzes //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-19: sangs rgyas sku la kun tu khebs pas gnas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-20: byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-21: bsnyen bkur byas nas dga' ste 'di skad du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-22: gang dag gis ni mi mchog mtshan thos pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-23: sems can de dag rnyed pa legs rnyed 'dzer //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-24: sangs rgyas zhing 'dir bdag cag lhags pas na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-25: bdag cag gis ni sngon rnyed legs par rnyed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402a-26: bskal pa stong du ston pas gang bsgrubs pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-0: rmi lam lta bu'i zhing ni @402b ci 'dra ltos //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-1: 'od ni dpag med gzi brjid dpag med pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-2: sku tshe dpag med dge 'dun dpag med pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-3: byang chub sems dpas bskor zhing mdzes gyur pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-4: sangs rgyas bsod nams phung po mchog la ltos //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-5: de nas tshe dpag med kyis 'dzum mdzad nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-6: 'od 'phro bye ba khrag khrig sum cu drug /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-7: de dag zhal gyi dkyil 'khor nas byung ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-8: zhing stong bye ba dag ni khyab par mdzad //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-9: 'od 'phro de dag thams cad slar log ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-10: 'dren pa'i spyi gtsug der ni nub par gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-11: de tshe 'od 'phro nub par gyur nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-12: lha dang mi rnams dga' ba rab tu skyed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-13: de nas sangs rgyas sras po grags chen po //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-14: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug de langs te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-15: gang slad 'jig rten mgon po 'dzum mdzad pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-16: bcom ldan de yi rgyu dang rkyen gang lags //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-17: sems can mang 'grol phan pa thugs brtse can //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-18: don dam mkhas pa de ni lung bstan gsol //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-19: gsung mchog yid du mchi ba de thos nas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-20: sems can dag ni dga' ba'i sems su 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-21: 'jig rten khams mang byang chub sems dpa' dag /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-22: sangs rgyas blta slad bde can 'dir mchi ba //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-23: de dag thos nas dga' ba cher bskyed de //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-24: myur du zhing 'di rnam par blta bar 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-25: rgya chen zhing 'dir lhags par gyur nas kyang; ;lha yi mig dang lha yi rna ba dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-26: tshe rabs dran dang blo gros mkhas mchog dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-27: rdzu 'phrul stobs kyang myur du thob par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:402b-28: sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyis lung bstan pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-2: sems can gang gis nga yi ming thos na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-3: nga yi zhing du rtag tu 'ong bar shog /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-4: nga yi smon lam bzang po de rdzogs pas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-5: 'jig rten khams mang dag nas sems can 'ong //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-6: de dag nga yi zhing du lhags nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-7: de dag skye ba gcig las phyir mi ldog /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-8: de phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'dir //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-9: bdag gi zhing yang 'di 'drar gyur pa dang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-10: bdag gi ming dang sgra dang lta bas kyang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-11: sems can mang po grol bar bya 'dod pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-12: de ni myur du rings par la gor du //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-13: bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams song la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-14: 'od dpag med kyi gan du song nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-15: sangs rgyas bye ba stong la mchod pa gyis //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-16: rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi zhing mang song nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-17: sangs rgyas bye ba mang la mchod bya ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-18: bde bar gshegs la mchod pa byas nas kyang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-19: dro khar bde ba can du slar yang 'ong ////
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-20: bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med de'i byang chub kyi shing ni 'phang du dpag tshad stong drug brgya yod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-25: 'dab ma dpag tshad brgyad brgya tshun chad du 'phyang ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-26: rtsa ba'i sboms dang khrun dpag tshad lnga brgya yod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-27: rtag tu lo ma chags pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403a-28: rtag tu me tog chags pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-0: kha dog brgya @403b stong du ma yod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-4: rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-5: zla ba lta bur snang ba'i nor bu rin po ches yongs su gsal ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-6: brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin po ches rnam par spras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-7: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches gang ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-8: rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che mchog gis shin tu rnam par spras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-11: se mo do mdzes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-12: rin po che'i chun po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-15: mu tig dmar po'i rgyan phreng dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-16: mu tig sngon po'i rgyan phreng dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-17: seng ge'i kha nas 'phyang ba'i ska rags kyi tshogs yod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-18: rin po che'i skud pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-19: rin po che thams cad dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-20: dung gis mngon par spras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-22: mu tig gi dra ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-23: rin po che thams cad kyi dra ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-24: dril bu g-yer kha'i dra bas bla rer bres pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-28: zla gam lta bus legs par brgyan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-29: nor bu 'khrol ba dang; gser dang rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-30: sems can gyi bsam pa'i rnam par rig pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par brgyan pa'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:403b-32: byang chub kyi shing de rlung gis bskyod na sgra dbyangs 'byung ba gang yin pa des 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa go bar byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404a-0: de la byang chub kyi shing gi sgra de sems can gang dag gi rna lam du grag @404a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404a-1: pa de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du rna nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404a-5: mtshungs pa med; gzhal du med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404a-7: brjod du med pa gang dag gi mig lam du byang chub kyi shing de snang ba de dag byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang mig nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404a-9: sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de'i dri tshor ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sna nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404a-10: sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de'i 'bras bu'i ro myong ba de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lce nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404a-11: byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sems can gang dag la khyab par gyur ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang lus la nad kyis mi btab par shes par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404a-13: sems can gang dag byang chub kyi shing de chos nyid du nges par sems pa de dag kyang de nas bzung ste byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du nam yang sems mi g-yeng par shes par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404a-14: sems can de dag thams cad ni byang chub kyi shing de mthong ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs @404b dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-1: sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-2: sngon gyi smon lam dang spyod pa shin tu rdzogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-5: ma tshang ba med pas 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-8: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-9: bzod pa rnam pa gsum 'thob bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-11: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-13: skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad skye ba gcig gis thogs pa gyur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-14: smon lam gyi dbang ni ma gtogs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-15: byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-16: go cha chen po bgos pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-17: sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba la mngon par brtson pa sha stag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-19: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'od 'dom gang ba sha stag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-20: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni 'od dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong pa sha stag ste //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:404b-21: byang chub sems dpa' gang 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khor yug tu snang bas khyab par byed pa gnyis ni ma gtogs so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis ming ci zhes @405a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405a-1: bgyi; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405a-3: de gnyis la gcig gi ming ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405a-4: gcig gi ming ni mthu chen thob ces bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405a-6: de gnyis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes so; ;kun dga' bo /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405a-7: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405a-8: lus yongs su rdzogs pa; bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa la mkhas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405a-9: shes rab kyis rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405a-12: kun shes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405a-16: yon tan mtha' yas pa mu med pa sha stag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405a-18: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'dra la ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405a-19: byang chub kyi mtha'i bar du log par mi ltung ba'i chos can sha stag ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405a-20: de dag thams cad 'di nas nye bar bzung nas nam yang tshe rabs mi dran par mi 'gyur gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405b-0: da ltar gyi nga bzhin du snyigs ma lnga'i dus na gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag @405b 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bskal pas bkrugs pa dag tu gnas par sngon smon lam btab pa rnams ni ma gtogs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405b-2: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa de dag thams cad snga dro gcig bzhin 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu dong nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma la bsnyen bkur byed de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405b-3: de dag rnam pa 'di lta bu'i me tog dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405b-15: glu dbyangs dang; rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dag gis mchod par bya'o snyam du ji lta ji ltar sems bskyed cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405b-16: ji ltar 'dod pa rnams de dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad lag pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405b-17: de dag gis me tog nas rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i bar de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la mchod pa byed la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405b-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po tshad med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405b-19: grangs med pa dag kyang bskyed cing gsog go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405b-20: gal te me tog gi skon bu rnam pa 'di lta bu lag pa nas 'byung bar gyur cig ces 'dod na yang de dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu lha'i me tog kha dog tha dad pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:405b-22: dri du ma yod pa'i skon bu dag lag pa nas 'byung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-0: de dag gis skon bu'i me tog rnam pa de lta bu de dag @406a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'thor /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-4: skon bu'i me tog gtor ba de dag thams cad las nang gi chung du gang yin pa de yang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam gyi me tog gi gdugs su 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-5: phyi ma shos ma gtor gyi bar snga mas la mi ltung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-6: de na skon bu'i me tog gtor ba gang steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad nyi shu'i tshad tsam gyi gdugs su 'gyur ba yang yod /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-8: bzhi bcu'i tshad tsam yang yod /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-9: steng gi bar snang la me tog gi gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong gi tshad kyi bar tsam du 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-10: de na gang dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po bskyed cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-11: sems dga' ba chen po thob pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med dpag tu med pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la bsnyen bkur byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-12: snga dro gcig la slar log nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-13: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yongs su zin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-14: sngon chos mnyan pa byin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-15: sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-16: sngon gyi smon lam 'byor zhing yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406a-18: shin tu rnam par phye ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-0: @406b shin tu bsgoms pas smon lam btab pa 'grub pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-2: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam smra ba dag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'du shes 'ga' yang mi bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-4: de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing de kun du 'chag cing rnam par rgyu ba na dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-5: mi dga' ba mi bskyed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-6: 'gro ba na yang ltos pa med pa nyid du 'gro'i /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-7: ltos pa dang bcas par ni ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-9: dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-11: sems de lta bu dag de dag la yod med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-13: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der skyes pa de dag la gzhan gyi 'du shes med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-19: mi mnyam pa'i sems med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-20: de dag ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-26: rab tu dang ba'i sems dang; brtan pa'i sems dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-27: sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:406b-29: rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa spyod pa'i sems @407a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-1: dang; sems kyi rgyud sgyu ma'i rang bzhin la blo rab tu zhugs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-2: shes rab rgya mtsho chen po dang mnyam pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-3: blo ri rab dang mtshungs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-4: yon tan du ma bsags pa; byang chub kyi yan lag yang dag par 'gro bas rnam par brtsen pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-5: sangs rgyas yang dag par 'gro ba la mngon par brtson pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-6: sha'i mig rab tu rnam par 'byed pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-7: lha'i mig mngon par bsgrub pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-8: shes rab kyi mig rtogs par khong du chud pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-9: chos kyi mig gi pha rol tu son pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-10: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrub cing 'chad de ston pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-11: rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cing chags pa med pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-12: khams gsum mnyam pa nyid du mngon par brtson pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-15: chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-16: kun 'byung ba'i nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-17: chos kyi nges pa'i tshig dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-18: gsal ba dang mi gsal ba la mkhas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-19: tshul dang tshul ma yin pa'i gnas la mkhas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-20: 'jig rten pa'i gtam la mi lta bar gnas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-21: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtam rnams kyi snying po rtogs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-22: chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-23: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes pas gnas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407a-24: dmigs pa med pa'i spyod yul ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-0: len pa med pas shin tu rnam @407b par grol bar nyon mongs pa med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-1: mngon par shes pa rnams la thug pa med par gnas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-2: rtsa ba med pa la gnas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-5: chos zab mo rnams la mngon par brtson pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-7: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rtogs par dka' ba la 'jug pas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-8: 'phags pa bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam rjes su thob pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-10: dogs pa las brgal pa; shes pa gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-11: lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-12: ye shes kyis mngon par 'phags te ri rab dang mtshungs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-13: 'khrugs pa med pa'i blos rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-14: shes rab kyi 'od dang dkar zhing shin tu dkar la dag cing dge ba'i sems dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-15: gser btso ma'i kha dog 'dra bar snang zhing 'od 'byung ba'i yon tan gyi mchog gis nyi zla'i 'od las shin tu 'das pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-16: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-17: mi dge ba bzod pas sa dang mtshungs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-18: nyon mongs pa'i dri ma 'khru bar 'bab pas chu dang 'dra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-19: chos thams cad la rlom sems su byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-20: nyon mongs pa sreg pa'i phyir me'i phung po dang mtshungs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-21: 'jig rten thams cad la mi chags pa'i phyir rlung dang 'dra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-22: chos thams cad nges par phigs pa dang thams cad du ci yang med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:407b-23: 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos pa'i phyir padma dang 'dra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-0: chos dang chos ma yin pa mngon par sgrogs pas dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i @408a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-2: chos kyi chu'i char mngon par 'bebs pas char ba chen po dang 'dra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-3: tshogs chen po zil gyis gnon pas khyu mchog dang mtshungs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-4: sems shin tu mchog tu dul bas glang po che chen po dang 'dra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-5: shin tu dul bas rta cang shes bzang po dang mtshungs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-6: rtsal dang mi 'jigs pas skrag pa med pa'i phyir ri dvags kyi rgyal po seng ge dang 'dra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-7: sems can thams cad yongs su skyod pas shing gi rgyal po n+ya gro da dang mtshungs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-8: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi g-yos pas ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang 'dra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-9: byams pa tshad med pa bsgoms pas nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-10: dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i sngon du 'gro bas tshangs pa chen po dang 'dra ba; gnas su gsog pa med pas bya dang mtshungs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-11: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pas bya'i rgyal po nam mkha'i lding dang 'dra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-12: 'byung bar dka' ba'i phyir au dum wa ra'i me tog dang mtshungs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-13: glang po che ltar shin tu mnyam par bzhags pas rnam par g-yeng ba med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-14: dbang po rmugs pa med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-15: rnam par gtan la 'bebs pa la mkhas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-16: bzod pa dang des pa mang ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-17: pha rol phun sum tshogs par smon pas phrag dog med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408a-18: chos kyi gtam rnams la 'jigs pa med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-0: chos yongs su tshol bas ngoms mi @408b myong ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-1: tshul khrims kyis bee d'ur+ya dang 'dra ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-2: thos pa rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang mtshungs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-3: chos kyi rnga sgra chen pos sgra snyan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-4: chos kyi rnga chen po brdung ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-5: chos kyi dung chen po 'bud pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-6: chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-7: chos kyi ba dan chen po 'dzin pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-8: chos kyi sgron ma chen po rab tu 'bar bar byed pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-9: shes rab kyis rnam par lta ba rmongs pa med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-15: yang dag par 'geng ba la dga' ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-17: sbyin pa la lag brkyang ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-18: chos dang zang zing yang dag par 'gyed pa la dga' ba sbyin pa la ser sna med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-26: ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-27: zug rngu phyung ba; gtan pa med pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-28: mngon par shes pa thob pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-41: mngon par shes pas rnam par brtsen pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-46: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:408b-47: nga rgyal gyi zug rngu bton pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409a-3: dam pas bsngags pas 'jig rten na mkhas pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409a-4: sbyangs pa'i ye shes yang dag par bsgrubs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409a-6: sems dga' ba dang ldan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409a-20: shes rab kyi mtshon cha'i lag cha can /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409a-25: khong khro ba dang bral ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409a-26: chos la rtag tu brtson pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409a-27: chos thams cad la thos brgya mtsho lta bur gyur pa sha stag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409a-29: mdor bsdu na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'di lta bu sha stag ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409a-30: rgyas par bya na gal te de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i tshad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du gnas pas bstan kyang skyes bu dam pa de dag gi yon tan gyi mtha' bstan pa mi nus la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409a-35: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yon tan rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi spobs pa bla na med pa de gnyis ka yang bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409b-0: longs la nub @409b phyogs su phyogs te me tog gtor la thal mo sbyor te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409b-1: gang na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med rdul med cing rnam par dag pa bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston pa'i phyogs der phyag 'tshol cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409b-2: de'i mtshan de yang sgrib pa med par phyogs bcur grags te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409b-3: phyogs re re na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsung chags pa mi mnga' zhing gsung thogs pa mi mnga' ba gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag lan 'ga' lan 'ga' ma yin par bsngags pa brjod cing bstod de snyan ba gsung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409b-4: de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409b-5: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409b-7: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409b-8: tshe dpag tu med pa de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa de dag la lta 'tshal lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409b-10: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshig 'di smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:409b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i phyag gi mthil nas 'od gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong snang bas khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od phyung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410a-0: de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong thams cad @410a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410a-14: lha dang mi gang su dag yod pa de dag thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de'i 'od kyis thal bar gyur cing zil gyis non par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410a-17: nyi ma shar nas mi zhig 'od ma gang tsam na 'dug pa la mi zhig blta ba de bzhin du; de'i tshe 'di lta ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410a-19: 'od de yongs su dag pa'i phyir dge slong dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410a-32: mi ma yin pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas mngon par 'phags te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410a-34: phyogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lha ma me lhan ne lhang nger mdzes pa de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410a-35: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410a-36: dge slong gi dge 'dun de la blta'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-0: sa chen po 'di chu @410b gcig tu gyur na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-1: de la shing ljon pa rnams med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-4: rtsva dang shing gel ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-8: ngam grog dang; g-yang sa rnams mi snang ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-9: gzhan du na sa chen po rgya mtsho gcig tu gyur pa ni ma gtogs so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-10: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos rnams kyi lus las mngon par 'grub pa'i 'od 'dom gang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'od dpag tshad bye ba brgya stong yod pa ma gtogs par gzhan rtags sam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-12: mtshan ma cung zad med do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med des nyan thos kyi tshogs de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de zil gyis mnan nas phyogs thams cad du gsal bar kun du snang ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-16: de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can der byang chub sems dpa' dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-18: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-20: mi de dag thams cad dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-21: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pos bskor zhing chos ston pa yang snang ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi pham pa la bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:410b-24: mi 'pham po khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-0: @411a *// steng gi par snang la kun dga'i ra mnyam dga' ba dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-1: nags tshal nyams dga' ba dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-2: skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-4: rdzing bu nyams dga' ba dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-5: rin po che'i me tog padma dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-7: padma dkar pos gang ba dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-8: 'og tu sa'i steng nas bzung ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-9: 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar gyi nam mkha'i ngos la me tog bkram pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-10: me tog gi phreng ba skun du mdzes par byas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-11: rin po che sna tshogs bkra ba'i phreng gis gang ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-12: de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i bya sna tshogs kyis bsten pa mthong ngam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-17: mi pham pa khyod kyis 'di las gzhan pa'i bya'i tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sgras go bar byed cing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-18: des byang chub sems dpa' de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral bar gyur pa dag mthong ngam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-23: mi pham pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sems can 'di dag gzhal med khang dpag tshad brgya stong yod pa dag tu zhugs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411a-24: bar snang la chags pa med par 'gro ba dag mthong ngam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-4: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes pa'i mi rnams tha dad du bya ba yod dam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-8: bdag gis ni tha dad du bgyi ba gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i mi rnams ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'i bar du lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-11: mi pham pa khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de na mi kha cig padma chen po dag gi mngal na gnas pa mthong ngam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-17: 'thab bral gyi lha rnams gzhal med khang dpag tshad lnga bcu pa'am /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-19: dpag tshad lnga brgya pa rnams su zhugs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-20: rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa de bzhin du /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-22: bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de'i mi kha cig padma chen po dag gi mngal na gnas par mthong lags so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-24: de na sems can brdzus te 'byung ba gang dag padma rnams la skyil mo krung bcas te 'byung ba dag kyang mchis na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-26: kha cig padma'i mngal na gnas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-27: kha cig padma la skyil mo krung bcas nas brdzus te 'byung ba de'i rgyu ni gang lags /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:411b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412a-1: dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na gnas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412a-2: tho tshom du lhung ba'i sems kyi 'jig rten gyi khams be ba can du skye ba bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa de dag ni de na mngal na gnas so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412a-3: gang dag the tshom med cing som nyi ma med de /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes chags pa med pa la yid ches shing dad la mos pa de dag ni padma rnams la skyil mo krung bcas nas brdzus te byung ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na gnas pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la blta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412a-8: bsnyen bkur bya bar sems bskyed cing the tshom mi bskyed la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412a-9: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med pa la som nyi med cing rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang gsog pa de dag ni skyil mo krung bcas nas brdzus te 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412a-12: byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas ring po ma lon pa gzhan dag dang 'dra bar yud tsam gyis lus rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412a-14: shes rab kyi khyad par dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412a-15: shes rab kyi rim pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-0: the tshom du lhung ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pas 'di ltar @412b lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongs su nyams shing /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-1: byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-5: dge ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad las yongs su nyams pa'i shes rab yongs su nyams pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-6: shes rab chung ba la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-11: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la khri mon gser dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-12: bed'u r+ya thams cad kyis spras pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-16: tshon sna tshogs kyis bla re bres pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-17: ras bcos bu gting ba; me tog gi sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-18: bdug pa rgya chen pos gdugs pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-24: ba gam rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-25: gser dang rin po che'i dril bu g-yer kha'i dra bas bres pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-29: them skas bzhi bcas pa zhig yod la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-30: rgyal po de'i bu nyes pa zhig gi phyir khri mon der bcug ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-31: 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi khong sgril du bcug la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-32: der de'i khri bshams te stan ko ni ka bting ba la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-33: bar tshangs can dang; pa la li ka bting ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-34: yul ka ling ka'i ras kyis gding ba bting la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-35: de'i steng du dar bting ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:412b-36: g-yas g-yon gnyis su rten ma dmar po bzhag la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413a-0: blta na sdug pa de la de @413a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413a-3: de'i zas skom gtsang ma bsod ba rnam pa mang po du ma bshams na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413a-6: rgyal po'i bu de yongs su spyad pa rgya che ba yin nam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413a-13: des de'i ro myang bar byed dam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413a-19: nongs pa gang gi slad du rgyal pos khri mon der stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413a-20: de las thar par 'tshal zhing rigs bzang po rigs bzang po'i gzhon nu dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413a-26: gang gis khri mon de las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba yongs su tshol te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413a-28: rgyal po'i bu de btson ra de na dga' ba ma mchis shing rgyal pos ma gnang gi bar du mi thar ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413a-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413a-31: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag the tshom du lhung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi mnyam pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413a-32: mnyam pa'i ye shes la som nyi za ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa de dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-0: sems dang ba tsam des 'jig rten gyis khams bde ba can der skye yang padma rnams la skyil mo krung @413b bcas shing brdzus te 'byung ba ma yin gyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-1: padma rnams kyi mngal na gnas pa myong ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-2: de dag de la skyed mos tshal dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-3: gzhal med khang du 'du shes shing gnas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-7: yid dang mi mthun pa mi 'byung mod kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-8: lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /
