K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-10: byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-11: 'bel ba'i chos kyi gtam rnam par nges pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-12: dge ba'i chos spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-13: de dag de na mngon par mi dga' zhing mgu ba mi 'thob kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-14: sngon gyi nyes pa zad nas de dag padma'i mngal nas 'byung ste; de dag de nas byung yang steng ngam /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-16: thad kar byung ba mi shes so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-18: 'di ltar lo lnga brgyar sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-19: dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po grangs med /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-21: dpag tu med pa dag bskyed par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-22: sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa yongs su gzung bar bya ba de thams cad kyang the tshom za ba'i nyes pas bsgrubs par ma gyur pa la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-24: the tshom gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod pa chen po ji tsam du 'gyur ba la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-26: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dag gis the tshom yongs su spangs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:413b-27: byang chub tu sems bskyed la myur du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i stobs bskyed pa'i mthu thob par bya ba'i phyir /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414a-1: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414a-2: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414a-3: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gan nas ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414a-9: byang chub sems dpa' yongs su grub pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414a-10: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas phyir mi ldog par yongs su 'grub na dge ba'i rtsa ba de bas chung ngu rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa bzod par dka' ba'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bco brgyad 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414a-12: byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414b-0: de'i gan @414b nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i 'od kyi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs dpag med kyi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi sgron ma'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa klu zil gyis gnon pa'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral 'od kyi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' khri brgyad stong 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs kyi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu rtsa gcig 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa mi'i dbang po'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:414b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa stobs mngon par shes pa'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' nyis khri nyis stong 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyal @415a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415a-1: mtshan gyi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus thob pa 'jug pa gcig gis yang dag par zhugs pa nyi ma brgyad pa gcig gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i 'khor ba bsnyil ba bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa 'bar ba'i bdag po'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa'i gan nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415a-7: yongs su dri bar bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415a-9: rnam grangs de lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag gi gan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la blta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415a-11: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'dong ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tshang bar brjod kyang mtha' rtogs par mi nus so //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415a-13: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi mtshan thos pa'i sems can de dag rnyed pa ji snyed cig legs par rnyed pa la ltos /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-0: sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med de la than sems dad pa gcig tsam @415b rnyed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-1: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las dad pa mi phyed pa de dag ni dman pa la mos par mi 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-3: de lta bas na khyod mos par bya /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-4: khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-7: tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-8: dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-11: kun chub par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-12: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-13: bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bar bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-15: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid zhag gcig tsam yang bzung zhing bcas te bklags shing kun chub par byas la /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-16: bsam pa thag pa nas gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-17: tha na glegs bam la legs par bris te bcang bar bya zhing de la ston pa'i 'du shes kyang bskyed par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-18: gang zhig sems can dpag tu med pa dag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la dgod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-19: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de la blta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-20: bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba las brgal te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:415b-21: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-0: thos nas kyang g-yor ma lhung ba'i rgyud kyis bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su @416a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-3: kun chub par bya ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-6: bsgom pa'i phyir brtson 'grus rlabs po che chen po brtsam par bya'o; ;tha na ba gcig 'jos pa de srid du yang gzhan dag la brjod par bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-7: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba de brgal nas kyang 'gyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par mi bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-10: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag du ma dag chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di nyan cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-11: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i bar du chos kyi rnam grangs rgya chen po rnam pa 'di lta bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-12: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-13: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang ba /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-14: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po myur du bsgrub pa 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed pa shin tu legs pa rnyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-15: sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-16: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-17: thos nas kyang dga' ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-18: mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-22: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416a-23: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-0: bsgom pa la dga' bar @416b 'gyur ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-1: tha na yi ger bris te mchod pa byed pa de dag kyang bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-2: de bgrang bar sla ba ma yin no //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-4: de ltar na ngas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de byas pa yin te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-5: khyod kyang da the tshom med par brtson par gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-6: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la som nyi ma za cig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-7: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i btson rar chud da re /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-9: sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-10: chos bstan pa rnyed par dka'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-11: dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-13: ngas khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsnyed kyi /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-14: da khyod kyis mngon par sbyor la sgrubs shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-16: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chud mi za bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su gtad pa chen po bya'o //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-17: sangs rgyas kyi chos mi nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ma 'khrugs par gyis shig /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-19: yun ring por gnod pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-23: log par ltung bar gyur ta re /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-24: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-25: bsod nams dag ni ma byas pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-27: dpa' bo gang dag don grub pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-30: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-31: gus dang bcas pas chos thos pas //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:416b-32: de dag dga' ba dam pa 'thob //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-2: sangs rgyas chos la dad pa rnyed mi nus //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-3: gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas mchod byas pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-4: de dag 'jig rten mgon gyi spyad la slob //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-5: dper na skyes bu yong ba mun khung na //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-6: lam yang mi shes bstan par ga la nus //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-7: de ltar nyan thos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-8: ye shes mi rtog sems can gzhan ci smos //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-9: sangs rgyas kyis ni sangs rgyas yon tan mkhyen //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-10: lha klu lha min gnod sbyin nyan thos min //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-11: sangs rgyas ye shes rab tu bshad pa ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-12: rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang 'di ma yin //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-13: gal te sems can thams cad bde bar gshegs //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-14: ye shes rnam dag don la mkhas gyur te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-15: de dag bskal pa 'am 'on te lhag par ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-16: sangs rgyas gcig gi yon tan rjod byed kyang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-17: de dag rab tu mya ngan 'das gyur gyi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-18: bskal pa bye ba mang por rab brjod kyang //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-19: sangs rgyas ye shes tshad med mi 'gyur te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-20: de ltar rgyal ba'i yon tan ngo mtshar to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-21: de bas mkhas pa rig pa'i rang bzhin mi //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-22: gang zhig nga yi tshig la yid ches te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-23: rgyal ba'i ye shes phung po dbang byas te //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-24: sangs rgyas nyid kyis mkhyen ces tshig tu brjod //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-25: brgya lam na ni mi yi lus rnyed la //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-26: brgya lam na ni sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-27: dad dang shes rab yun ring rnyed par 'gyur;/
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-28: de bas don thob bya phyir brtson 'grus bskyed //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-29: gang zhig chos mchog 'di 'dra thos nas ni //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417a-30: bde gshegs dran pa dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417b-0: gang zhig sangs rgyas byang chub @417b mos bskyed pa //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417b-1: de dag 'das pa'i dus na deng dang shes //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417b-2: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can bye ba phrag bcu gnyis chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag go /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417b-3: bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa bzhis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417b-4: dge slong brgyad brgya ni len pa med pa'i zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417b-5: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417b-6: lha dang mi'i skye dgu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu ni sngon sems ma bskyed pa las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la blta ba dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417b-8: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bde ba can du skye bar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar byed do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417b-9: de dag thams cad der skyes nas kyang mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad las bzod pa thob ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:417b-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang 'jig @418a *//
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-1: rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-3: spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-4: de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-5: cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyang kun du snang ngo //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-6: me tog man da ra ba dag kyang sa la pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-8: mi'i sil snyan rnams kyang rab tu grag par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-9: 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du yang rjes su yi rang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par gyur to //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi pham pa dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-12: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-13: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-16: lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-18: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-21: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-23: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba ban de ye shes sdes ba sgyur cing zhus /
K07acip-k_lha_sa-035-005:418a-24: te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa ////
